entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
